text:
Viceroy Kendal Santor d'Sivis is the head of the [[Ninth College]] and a lord seneschal of House [[Sivis]], advising the [[Doyenne|Lysse Lyrriman d'Sivis]] on matters of magic. He is also a skilled [[wizard]], with a specialty in [[divination]].

The viceroy personally assigns challenging tasks to each hopeful applicant to the Ninth College; these might involve anything from creating a new word to recovering a book of forgotten spells from a ruined library in [[Xen'drik]].
title: Kendal Santor d'Sivis
tags: Korranberg gnome Sivis humanoid [[Ninth College]] [[Labyrinth (enclave)]] wizard
tooltip: head of the Ninth College of House Sivis
